title: Aurelion Sol Doesn't Say Boop Enough

replies.body: I just want to remind you of "BOOM, 'EADSHOT" from Caitlyn's first week of rework.
"not like this"
"Not today..."
*panting intensifies*
Remember that was bugged on PBE?

I was reminded of this.....But I want the boop
BOOP {{champion:136}}
tldr
[http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby/images/f/fc/Boop.gif/revision/20130824082518](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby/images/f/fc/Boop.gif/revision/20130824082518)
http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/027/273/dbf.gif
Hello again
ah nora you amazing sheThor

~~Dammit gif why didn't you work~~

Nvm, all good now

Hey my friends. I'll give you hapiness,endless boops
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69NsyKShfCk
Did you make this?

> [{quoted}](name=roar2001,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZXfTrLRQ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-04T13:02:35.936+0000)
>
> Did you make this?

nope, but  I like sharing my discoveries :p
wait, did you name yourself after one of the nazgûl or am i being retarded here?
yeah,that's him :D
I have this open, staggered in 12 tabs.
What do you think I listen to when in game with Aurelion?

I promise everyone more boop.

And I'll make the minions pay for it.
obscure political reference recognized
Imagine {{champion:75}}  going 'boop' whenever he Qs.

Actually it should be when he gets a q stack.
And shifting between "Boop" "Boink" and "Delicious Minions."

> [{quoted}](name=Rendarkan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZXfTrLRQ,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-04-04T13:51:33.640+0000)
>
> Actually it should be when he gets a q stack.
> And shifting between "Boop" "Boink" and "Delicious Minions."

But what about Q'ing champions?

"I love the taste of salty tears."
Obviously on a kill.

Same sound effects. After all, they're nothing but stacks all the same.
https://youtu.be/JWoutRoqjpk
"OM NOM NOM NOM"
I wish he had a skin that made a squeaky hammer noise whenever he Q's.

> [{quoted}](name=Alleo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZXfTrLRQ,comment-id=00060003,timestamp=2016-04-04T20:07:14.731+0000)
>
> I wish he had a skin that made a squeaky hammer noise whenever he Q's.

Kindergarten Nasus? ok
Puppy Nasus. Wields a squeak toy.
I think he should just say GG everytime.....Well thats at least what I hear when I see Nasus about to Q me, my friends or my towers.
Just watch Trick2g playing him. You get all the "boom!"s you could ever want. Not to mentioned other unmentionables.
Without this comment, I never would have seen this thread. Props.

{{champion:75}} Every time he stacks off a champion, he should say "boop"
{{champion:420}} Should occasionally say "oops" when a tentacle kills a vesseled champion. 
{{champion:245}} Should say "bonk" if he whacks someone with his chrono stick. 

More champions should have silly stuff like Sol going "boop". It's fun.
{{champion:133}} says 'nyoom' when she ults

https://youtu.be/F2kBOJeMS7Q?t=23

At 23 seconds, that is the sound ekko needs.
Not chrono stick. Clock hand. It's a piltover clock hand.
I agree #freetheBOOP

he says boop?
i never heard it
i think...
{{champion:136}} BOOP
Wait? He says Boop? lol

It really makes my entire League existence when Aurelion Sol kills someone while saying boop.  It's perfect and I love it.

Yes, more boop.

I wish Poppy told her other two jokes more than 1/50 times, especially since I think the bank robbing joke is way funnier and more awkward than the tavern joke. I've straight-up had people argue with me, saying they play Poppy all the time and she only has one joke.
Wait wasn't this post already made?
Deleted before because it shouldn't have been under gameplay.

Can confirm. I find that I often have to say Boop myself. Out loud.

It is confusing for my roomates.
